Title: Viswasam
Overview: A village ruffian, who settles disputes in his native, takes on a big shot when he tries to sort out the rough patch in his marriage after several years.

Title: Bigil
Overview: A do-gooder don wants his footballer son to uplift the life of his people by becoming a champion, but fate draws the youngster into a life of violence. Will he be able to fulfill his father’s dream when an opportunity comes his way seven years later?

Title: Kaithi
Overview: Dilli, a convicted criminal, is out on parole to meet his daughter. However, a drug bust sets him off on a mission to save the life of police officers.

Title: Thadam
Overview: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among a few cops when they find out that the one accused in the crime has a look-alike!

Title: Namma Veettu Pillai
Overview: Arumpon wants his sister to get married into a good family, but is forced to accept her marriage to a local goon, with whom he is at loggerheads. Will the brother-sister relationship survive?

Title: Peranbu
Overview: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

Title: Kaappaan
Overview: A Special Protection Group officer has to identify the threat to the prime minister, who he is protecting, and also the nation.

Title: House Owner
Overview: An elderly couple, a house wife and a retired army man, go through some unanticipated moments during a rainy season in Chennai.

Title: Adithya Varma
Overview: A brilliant and short-tempered young surgeon goes down a self-destructive path when the love of his life is forced to marry another man.

Title: Kanchana 3
Overview: A young man who gets easily scared is possessed by a ghost that is seeking revenge.

Title: Game Over
Overview: Swapna, a nyctophobic game designer on a turbulent road to recovery from an incident that scarred her deeply, has to fight her inner demons to stay alive in the game called life.

Title: Kuppathu Raja
Overview: A story about the relationship between the slum dwellers in Chennai and how certain anti-social elements create unrest in their lives.

Title: Petta
Overview: A hostel warden becomes the target of a dreaded politician and his gangster son, but little do they realise that it is they who should fear him.

Title: Enai Noki Paayum Thota
Overview: A college student’s life takes an unexpected turn when he falls for an actress caught in a dangerous web of control. As their love story unfolds, he is drawn into a high-stakes world where survival becomes the ultimate challenge.

Title: Sigai
Overview: A pimp must investigate the sudden disappearance of his network’s most demanded prostitute.

Title: Sillu Karuppatti
Overview: An anthology of four romantic stories across four age groups connected by that magical thread called love.

Title: Uriyadi 2
Overview: A young man struggles for justice for the victims who are affected by the chemical plant leakage which lead to many deaths in the village.

Title: Mehandi Circus
Overview: A music shop owner falls in love with a girl from a circus troupe that visits his village, but caste and class stand in the way.
A young cop, who works in a police control room, tries to solve the mysterious case of a kidnapped girl.

Title: Dev
Overview: A youngster who has to fight against all the odds in order to achieve his desires.

Title: Kolaiyuthir Kaalam
Overview: The heiress of a multi-millionaire, a hearing and speech impaired young woman, has to fend off a slasher all alone in her palatial estate.

Title: Sangathamizhan
Overview: A village is protesting against the setting up a copper plant, but when their leader dies, the corporate company behind the plant sends in a look-alike to facilitate their plan.

Title: Dharma Prabhu
Overview: Lord Shiva accuses Yama for saving the life of a criminal-politician when the latter tries to stop a little girl from dying. Yama is given a few days' time to rectify his action.

Title: Super Deluxe
Overview: An unfaithful newly-wed wife, an estranged parent, a priest and an angry son suddenly find themselves in the most unexpected predicaments, each poised to experience their destiny, all on one fateful day.

Title: Mr. Local
Overview: A happy-go-lucky guy lands in trouble after he locks horns with an egoistic lady.

Title: Kadaram Kondan
Overview: Kadaram Kondan (Conqueror of Kadaram):  The pregnant wife of a young doctor is kidnapped and the kidnappers want him to help free a patient who is admitted in the hospital. Who is the patient? And why are the cops and criminals after him?

Title: Asuran
Overview: A family from the underprivileged class is on the run after the teenaged son kills a rich man from the upper caste. Can the pacifist father be able to save his hot-blooded son?

Title: Nerkonda Paarvai
Overview: When three young women are harassed and implicated in a crime they didn't commit, a bipolar lawyer sets out to help them clear their names and prove it to everyone that a woman's consent matters.

Title: Sagaa
Overview: Young orphans Sathya and Kadhir are raised by a local lady-goon in the dark areas of a bustling metro. They are orphaned again when she is killed by her own brother after a dispute over property. Sathya and Kadhir avenge her death, which lands them in jail. While in jail, Sathya befriends two other inmates and manages to escape with them.

Title: Action
Overview: An Indian army officer goes after the mastermind behind a terror attack that also resulted in personal loss to him.

Title: Jada
Overview: Jada is an upcoming Indian Tamil language sports drama film written and directed by Kumaran on his directorial debut. The film stars Kathir and newcomer Roshini in the lead roles, while Kishore and Yogi Babu play supporting roles.

Title: Aadai
Overview: A free-spirited girl gets the shock of her life when she finds herself naked in an abandoned building after a late-night party.

Title: Hero
Overview: A fraudster gets to fulfill his childhood dream of being a superhero when he takes on a ruthless businessman whose business strategy is to crush the dreams of children.

Title: 90 ML
Overview: Thamara, Paru, Kajal and Suganya are four friends who are rather tired of their uneventful routine. However, things take a turn for the better with the arrival of the spirited and outgoing Rita, a young woman who encourages them to live their lives to the fullest.

Title: Airaa
Overview: A young woman encounters a supernatural presence in her grandmother's home.

Title: Nungambakkam
Overview: The story based on the sensational Swathi murder case. Nungambakkam title refers to the railway station in Chennai where the 24-year-old software engineer Swathi was stabbed to death. Swathi was murdered when she was waiting for the train in the morning at the Nungambakkam railway station on June 24, 2016.

Title: Kee
Overview: A hacker gets the shock of his life when another hacker tries to destroy his dear ones.

Title: Aruvam
Overview: A food safety officer and a teacher who has no sense of smell come together to fight the practice of food adulteration and its devastating effect on people.

Title: Kaaviyyan
Overview: Akilan Vishwanathan, an Indian cop known for his intellectual mind, chases the culprit involved in a multiple kidnapping and murder in Las Vegas. Will he be able to succeed?

Title: Thambi
Overview: Brother and sister who get separated and reunite years later when the brother has grown to be a criminal.

Title: Comali
Overview: A youngster in his mid-30s goes through a series of struggles after coming to terms with the fact that he was in coma for 16 years.

Title: Natpe Thunai
Overview: Prabakaran, an international hockey player who choose to leave the sport picks it up again only to save the ground of a local team.

Title: Ayogya
Overview: When a corrupt cop gets embroiled in a heroic brawl, he has no idea how it would eventually lead him to a shocking rape case and change his life forever.

Title: Vantha Rajavathaan Varuven
Overview: The young heir of a rich family embarks on a journey to effect a reconciliation between estranged family members.

Title: Irandam Ulagaporin Kadaisi Gundu
Overview: A hardworking lorry driver who works at an old paper mart learns about the presence of a bomb and does everything he can to stop it from exploding.

Title: Nenjamundu Nermaiyundu Odu Raja
Overview: Two ambitious youngsters who make a living through a YouTube channel agree to perform a few tasks for a businessman when the latter offers them huge money.

Title: Puppy
Overview: A final year college student gets the shock of his life after knowing that he's gonna become a father as his girlfriend shows positive pregnancy test result. How is he going to face his parents?

Title: Ispade Rajavum Idhaya Raniyum
Overview: The relationship between a grumpy guy and a practical girl becomes complicated when the latter gets tired of the former’s impatient behaviour.

Title: R. K. Nagar
Overview: Things look up for a Chennai man struggling to make ends meet when he falls for a politician's daughter until he gets entangled in a murder case.

Title: NGK
Overview: An educated do-gooder is forced to enter politics in order to serve the society. But, will the old guard make way and allow him to do that?

Title: Sivappu Manjal Pachai
Overview: A street racer and a traffic cop end up becoming brothers-in-law. Can they accept each other given their previous hostile history?

Title: 100% Kaadhal
Overview: Balu and Mahalakshmi fall for each other but separate due to ego problems. Years later, when their grandmother falls ill, they are forced to confront each other resulting in chaos for both their families.

Title: Monster
Overview: A compassionate man faces a test of his faith from a rat that shows no sign of leaving his home.

Title: Jackpot
Overview: Two con women lock horn with a gangster after knowing that a mystic vessel is hidden in his home.

Title: Sindhubaadh
Overview: A small-time thief and his protégé go to Thailand to rescue his wife, who is being held captive by a gang involved in skin trade.

Title: Thittam Pottu Thirudura Koottam
Overview: Thittam Pottu Thirudura Koottam is an upcoming Indian Tamil comedy film directed by Sudhar. The film features a cast of Chandran, Satna Titus and Parthiepan in the lead roles. The film began production in mid 2016.

Title: Magamuni
Overview: Two long-separated brothers end up in life-threatening situations. How do their lives intersect and what happens next?

Title: Dhilluku Dhuddu 2
Overview: A happy-go-lucky guy has to recover his lady love from the ghostly spirit who accompanies her always.

Title: Igloo
Overview: Webbed around a couple who believe, preach and practise positivity, where the ‘picture perfect’ lives of a couple are devastated with a hazardous illness and how they handle it positively

Title: Devi 2
Overview: A doting wife goes through a hard time trying to save her husband who is possessed by two spirits.

Title: Jiivi
Overview: Frustrated at his failed romance, Saravanan decides to steal from his landlady’s house. Even as he comes up with clever ways to outsmart the cops, he realises that his actions are echoes from the past.

Title: Nethraa
Overview: A young woman moves to Canada with her boyfriend to get married with the help of her friend, but finds herself trapped in a web of lies and deciet.

Title: Dhanusu Raasi Neyargalae
Overview: An young man struggling to get a girl to marry against his tough horoscope rules and finding a matching girl without any conflict on same.

Title: Raatchasi
Overview: The headmaster of a government school brings in several changes at her institution despite facing odds from various quarters.

Title: Sarvam Thaala Mayam
Overview: Peter who tries to find his place in the world of classical Indian music embarks on a journey that helps him evolve personally, spiritually and musically.

Title: Super Duper
Overview: Two petty criminals end up kidnapping the wrong woman, and end up in a situation where they have to deal with a kingpin of a drug mafia.

Title: Kennedy Club
Overview: A kabaddi team faces several struggles while competing in a national-level championship.

Title: Kalavani 2
Overview: An irresponsible youngster locks horns with one of his relatives in a rural election.

Title: LKG
Overview: A small-time politician aspires to become the leader of the state.

Title: Charlie Chaplin 2
Overview: A marriage is in the verge of trouble as the groom sends an abusive message to the bride under the influence of alcohol. Will he able to save the wedding?

Title: Gurkha
Overview: The security guard of a mall, who belongs to the Gurkha community, becomes the saviour of several people who have been kept under siege by some terrorists.

Title: Boomerang
Overview: A guy who gets a face transplant done, following a fire accident, realises many are after his life. He sets out to find the reason for the same.

Title: Devarattam
Overview: A lawyer ends up killing the son of a gangster and the latter swears revenge.

Title: Vennila Kabaddi Kuzhu 2
Overview: The son of a disgraced kabaddi player realises his father's dream of helping his team, Vennila Kabadi Kuzhu, win the title in a kabaddi tournament.

Title: Simba
Overview: A stoner befriends a Great Dane, who is the pet of his neighbour, and tries to make her fall in love with him.

Title: Vellai Pookal
Overview: A retired cop goes to the US to live with his son and becomes involved with a kidnapping case. Even as he is trying to track down the kidnapper, the case becomes too personal.

Title: Market Raja MBBS
Overview: An arrogant don is possessed by the ghost of a medical college student and turns meek. Now, his accomplices have hide this fact from the outside world and ensure the return of the actual don.

Title: Kanne Kalaimaane
Overview: A rich farmer named Kamala Kannan, and chronicles the changes in his world following the arrival of Bharathi, a newly appointed bank manager in the village.

Title: Vilambaram
Overview: A romantic film directed by KA Suriyanithi, starring Abhinay Vaddi, Aishwarya Rajesh and Shri Ayrah in the lead roles.

Title: Chithiram Pesuthadi 2
Overview: Thiru, a hired killer, attacks a dreaded gangster with a sickle. However, he is forced to go underground after a man named Kathir witnesses his crime.

Title: Sixer
Overview: A site engineer, who suffers from night blindness, gets into trouble when he is mistaken for the leader of a protest group by a goon. His life becomes even more complicated after he falls in love.

Title: Nedunalvaadai
Overview: An unemployed youngster is at the crossroads, puzzled about choosing between family and love.

Title: Aghavan
Overview: A group of criminals hatch a plan to loot the wealth of a huge temple for their selfish needs.

Title: Miga Miga Avasaram
Overview: A female cop has a tough time trying to strike a balance between answering nature's call and her duty

Title: Agni Devi
Overview: A crime film directed by JPR and Sham Surya, starring Bobby Simha and Sathish Krishnan in the lead roles.

Title: Adutha Saattai
Overview: A college professor tries to unite his students who lack proper guidance from parents and teachers.

Title: Capmaari
Overview: Vijay, a software engineer happens to share a coach with Jenny  where they share beers, then one thing leads to another and they get physically close. They meet after some years and decide to get married. While everything seems to be smooth, Vijay’s colleague Varsha  enters their home pregnant claiming Vijay is the father of the child.

Title: Kaalidas
Overview: A cop, who suffers from family issues, takes up a peculiar suicide case. The plot thickens as similar cases get reported within a span of a few days.

Title: Pottu
Overview: A MBBS student attempts suicide by cutting his hand after performing badly at college,. Things take a turn when his blood spills on a tomb of Pottu, and a mysterious power enters his body which forces him to behave like a girl.

Title: Kazhugu 2
Overview: Two petty thieves based out of Theni, masquerading as hunters, come to the forests of Kodai to save people settled there from deadly wolf attack .

Title: Sathru
Overview: The kidnapping comes to a jolting halt when an honest police inspector decides to punish a five-member gang of youngsters who kidnap children for ransom.

Title: Thozhar Venkatesan
Overview: The life of a youngster, who runs a small-scale soda factory, turns topsy-turvy after he meets with a horrific accident. Little does he realise that more troubles are awaiting him.

Title: Iruttu
Overview: A cop who takes charge at a police station in a hill station goes after the reasons behind a few unnatural deaths which seem mysterious like never before.

Title: July Kaatril
Overview: A happy-go-lucky youngster’s approach towards romance changes after he becomes close with three women in different phases of his life.

Title: Thumbaa
Overview: Two painters and a photographer try to stop a forest officer from poaching a tiger.

Title: Neeya 2
Overview: A shape-shifting snake-woman, who is in search of her lover, who she lost two decades ago, sets out to win his love again.

Title: Mei
Overview: The missing case of a young girl unfolds several hidden crimes related to a medical racket as investigation progresses.

Title: Bodhai Yeri Budhi Maari
Overview: A man visits his friends a day before his wedding and ends up taking a potent drug. How does this change his life?

Title: Thirumanam
Overview: A couple who is in love convinces their respective families about their plans to lead life together. However, they realise that both the families are poles apart when they start the wedding preparations.

Title: Kolaigaran
Overview: A man is found to be murdered and the investigating officer believes that he was killed by a young woman and her mother. But their neighbour claims that he is the murderer! Who is lying?

Title: K-13
Overview: While partying with his friends on a night, a young man bumps into a beautiful young woman. What first looks like a one night stand soon turns into a night that he cannot forget.

Title: Petromax
Overview: A man struggles to sell his house that is haunted so he arranges four people to live in the house for a few days to prove that there are no ghosts.

Title: Embiran
Overview: Fate had different plan for a girl when she decides to open up her feelings to the person she is madly in love with.

Title: Kuthuoosi
Overview: A well-educated youngster drops his plans of settling down in the US to develop agriculture in his village, but faces threat from many people.

Title: Suttu Pidikka Utharavu
Overview: The people of a crowded colony in Coimbatore city go through a hard time as a few heavily armed criminals enter the place when they try to escape from the cops.

Title: Pancharaaksharam
Overview: Five friends playfully read passages of doom from a book that can predict an individual’s future. Can they overcome the tragedies that fate has in store for them and rewrite their destinies?

Title: Neerthirai
Overview: A drama film directed by PS Dharan, starring Nasser and Thalaivasal Vijay in the lead roles.

Title: Zombie
Overview: A group of individuals are trapped in a resort where there's a zombie outbreak. Can they get out of the place alive?

Title: Pulanaivu
Overview: Aishwarya, a young and beautiful woman who is just starting college, is trying to move on from her previous relationship. So she is not interested when one of her new friends falls for her and tries hard to earn her love and attention. As their love story develops, a murder suddenly occurs.

Title: Kolanji
Overview: A young boy realises there is love and affection behind the strictness of his father.

Title: Gangs of Madras
Overview: A woman who loses her husband in a police encounter plots to take revenge on the gangsters who had framed him.

Title: Azhiyatha Kolangal 2
Overview: An unexpected incident turns the life of a celebrated writer and his college girlfriend topsy-turvy.

Title: Lisaa
Overview: A young woman goes to meet her estranged grandparents and ends up facing life-threatening situations.

Title: Natpuna Ennanu Theriyuma
Overview: The relationship of three ambitious friends goes through a rough patch when two of them fall for the same girl.

Title: Unarvu
Overview: A social worker, who aspires to make India a beggar-free country, faces threats from several quarters.

Title: Kalavu
Overview: After being attacked by three unidentified men, Shruti is rushed to the hospital. The very same night three drunk friends, Sujith, Ramesh and Stephan, are arrested by police under the suspicion of attacking Shruti. Meanwhile, Shruti passes away in the hospital under mysterious circumstances and the three friends struggle to prove their innocence.

Title: Bakrid
Overview: A young farmer, who starts rearing a camel, gets to know that the animal deserves to live in a desert for its well-being. He sets out to Rajasthan for the same, but goes through a lot of hardships.

Title: Pettikadai
Overview: A young doctor decides to help the small traders of a village who are financially affected by the presence of an online supermarket.

Title: Watchman
Overview: An ambitious youngster, who is all set to get engaged to his ladylove in a few hours, gets trapped in a secluded bungalow and faces death threat in different ways.

Title: Thanimai
Overview: A drama film directed by S Sivaraman, starring Sonia Agarwal in the lead role.

Title: Gilli Bambaram Goli
Overview: Four youngsters, who work in Malaysia, lock horns with a local gangster.

Title: Podhu Nalan Karudhi
Overview: The lives of a few people get affected when ego clash erupts between a few cut-throat loan sharks

Title: Oththa Seruppu Size 7
Overview: An emotionally unstable murder suspect explains the modus operandi behind the crimes he had committed to a few cops which helps in unfolding some intriguing revelation.

Title: Champion
Overview: A sports film directed by Suseenthiran, starring Mirnalini Ravi, Vishwa and Narain Kumar in the lead roles.

Title: Gorilla
Overview: Three friends who need money to better their lives and a disillusioned farmer hatch a plan to rob a bank with a chimp as an accomplice.

Title: A1
Overview: The life of a caste fanatic girl, who aspires to get married to a goon, becomes a roller-coaster ride after she realises that she's with the wrong person.

Title: Goko Mako
Overview: An adventurous road trip of two lovers is being captured on camera by a crazy video crew, along with an insane group of musicians who intend to turn this footage into a music video for a music company contract.

Title: Maaniik
Overview: When Maaniik is convinced that he is cursed in love, things take a turn for the better when a girl named Keerthi walks into his life.

Title: Mayuran
Overview: A college student locks horns with a dreaded gangster after getting to know that his friend was killed by the latter.  But he realises that his opponent is too big for him and hatches plans to defeat him.

Title: Kudimagan
Overview: Kandhan, a villager leading a happy life, gets addicted to alcohol and begins to destroy his own life because of his dependency on the drink.

Title: Rocky: The Revenge
Overview: An action film directed by KC Bokadia, starring Srikanth Krishnamachari, Eshanya Maheshwari and Nasser in the lead roles.

Title: Thorati
Overview: A care-free shepherd, who befriends three thieves without knowing their past, lands in trouble post his marriage.

Title: Venpa
Overview: Thenavan, a pensive man who constantly rejecting women of his mother’s choice including Sheila. Sheila, sweet dark skinned girl who’s often rejected by guys from matrimony falls in love with Thenavan on first meeting over his comforting gestures. The reason behind Thenavan’s rejections slowly unveiled upon his sighting of Kalyani, his school time love. Kalyani’s arrival back to home country is welcomed with a disaster of her handbag being stolen. Thenavan assists throughout her difficulties and requests an hour of conversation as a return favour. The one hour conversation end up as big turning point for Thenavan, Kalyani and Sheila with the presence of former lover of Kalyani, Sathya.

Title: Saaral
Overview: A romantic film directed by DRL, starring Azhar and Sri Priyanka in the lead roles.

Title: Pattipulam
Overview: Due to street racing by local guys, a girl looses her parents and she takes revenge on the street racer!

Title: Ganesha Meendum Santhippom
Overview: A youngster moves to a big city to earn money to save his lover whose life is in danger.

Title: The Mosquito Philosophy
Overview: When Suresh springs a surprise party on his friends to announce his wedding on a balmy night in Chennai, several uncomfortable questions find answers at the end of which it is he who is in for a surprise!

Title: Kaadhal Munnetra Kazhagam
Overview: Four fans of actors Rajinikanth, Kamal Haasan, Vijayakanth and Karthik respectively, pursue the same girl.

Title: Mosadi
Overview: A team of cops are after a gang of conmen who cheated several people in different ways.

Title: Kuttram Seiyel
Overview: A police officer is determined to take down a gangster, who is extorting money from the businesses in the city and kills anyone against him. Things worsen when a group of college students who are interested in the case start doing their own research into it.
